1370: Gherbaren moved to St. Aechten straet.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Lisebette at age 31 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Lisebette, Mette, at age 31.
1372: Had a daughter with Lisebette, Margareta, at age 33.
1373: Had a son with Lisebette, Menaures, at age 34.
1374: Lost daughter Mette when Mette was 5 years old.
1378: Had a son with Lisebette, Eligius, at age 39.
1379: Had a son with Lisebette, Sanse, at age 40.
1380: Had a daughter with Lisebette, Gheesen, at age 41.
1383: Had a son with Lisebette, Kerolus, at age 44.
